text: Æfter æriste ures drihtenes Hælendes Cristes and his wuldorfæstan upastigenesse on heofonas to þam ælmihtigan Gode.
On his nama andetnysse maniga martyros wæron þrowiende, and his apostoli geliffæsste.
Nu ge gebroðra mine, ge gehyrdon be þære eadigan Margaretan þrowunge, hu heo ofer swiðe ealra deofla mægen gelyfað on hi and on God ælmihtine.
And doþ gemynd þare halgan fæmnan Sancta Margaretan and Sancta Marian, and on heora ðanc ælmessan syllað, þæt hi eow onfon on gesihðe Hælendes Cristes.
Him is lof and wuldor and weorþmynt, and a he lyfaþ mid englum, and mid heahfæderum, and mid witegum, and mid apostolum, and mid haligum fæmnum, in ealra worulda woruld a buton ende, Amen.
